name: Andrzej Nowak
commentByName: As the first candidate alphabetically, Andrzej brings years of economic policy experience to the race.
commentByAge: With his extensive experience, Andrzej offers a mature perspective on international relations.

name: Barbara Kowalska
commentByName: Barbara's campaign focuses on education reform and modernizing Poland's school system.
commentByAge: Barbara brings a balance of experience and fresh ideas to her ambitious platform.

name: Czesław Janowski
commentByName: Czesław has built his campaign around traditional Polish values and heritage preservation.
commentByAge: As one of the older candidates, Czesław emphasizes wisdom gained from decades in politics.

name: Dorota Majewska
commentByName: Dorota represents a new generation of Polish politicians focused on technology and innovation.
commentByAge: Among the younger candidates, Dorota brings tech-savvy solutions to traditional problems.

name: Emil Wiśniewski
commentByName: Emil's platform centers on strengthening Poland's position within the European Union.
commentByAge: With decades of diplomatic experience, Emil understands international politics deeply.

name: Franciszka Dąbrowska
commentByName: Franciszka campaigns on environmental protection and sustainable development for Poland.
commentByAge: As the youngest candidate, Franciszka represents the voice of Poland's future generations.
